definition: awe-inspiring/abbr. for 赫茲|赫兹[he4 zi1], hertz (Hz)
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: I’m thinking of what Herbert Hoover faced during the Great Depression.
sentences.chinese: 我想到了赫伯特胡佛在大萧条中所面对的境况。

sentences.english: Herbert will get half the cash, according to The Times of London.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯特将得到这笔现金的一半，据伦敦时报报导。

sentences.english: It assumes that global oil production will follow a bell shaped curve.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯特模型认为世界石油产量呈钟形曲。

sentences.english: "They are good to eat, and also their flesh is very delicate, " replied Herbert.
sentences.chinese: “锦鸡很好吃，它们的肉很嫩，”赫伯特回答说。

sentences.english: Was Herbert able to fulfill the task?
sentences.chinese: 赫伯特能不能完成使命？

sentences.english: How was your first class with Herbert?
sentences.chinese: 你跟赫伯特的第一堂课上得如何？

sentences.english: I also analyzed the sentiment index maintained by Hulbert Financial Digest (HFD).
sentences.chinese: 我还分析了赫伯特金融摘要维持的情绪指数。

sentences.english: Herbert, for whom it was too deep, swam like a fish, and got through capitally.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯特嫌水太深，就象一条鱼似的很出色地游过去了。

sentences.english: My father, Herbert, moved back to Brooklyn, where he'd grown up.
sentences.chinese: 我的父亲赫伯特搬回他从小长大的布鲁克林区。

sentences.english: One of the most famous forecast models is called the Hubbert model2.
sentences.chinese: 其中最著名的预测模型之一是赫伯特模型。

sentences.english: Herbet bought a notebook at the stationery store.
sentences.chinese: 赫伯特在文具店买了一本笔记本。

definition: Hofmann or Hoffman (name)/August Wilhelm von Hofmann (1818-1892), German chemist/Dustin Hoffman (1937-), US film actor
becquerel (unit of radioactivity, symbol Bq)/abbr. for 貝克勒爾|贝克勒尔[bei4 ke4 le4 er3]
